section.p: One of the guards catches up with you a few streets away from the palace. ‘You are a merchant?’ he demands in an imperious voice. ‘I am interested in western styles of armour and would like to purchase any stock you might have.’
It is beneath his dignity to haggle, so you are able to strike a good bargain.

The only drawback is that he insists on buying all the armour you have on you - including any you happen to be wearing! If you sell him all your suits of armour, add the money to your Adventure Sheet and . If you refuse to sell him everything, . [Decide how honest you want to be --Ed]
